mapper.select: SELECT d.database_name FROM db_info d INNER JOIN database_group_relation dgr ON d.database_guid = dgr.database_guid INNER JOIN user_group_relation ugr ON dgr.group_id = ugr.group_id INNER JOIN user_group ug ON ugr.group_id = ug.id WHERE ugr.user_id = #{userId} AND ug.valid = TRUE AND ug.tenant = #{tenantId} AND dgr.source_id = 'hive'
